code: @AfterClass public static void stopService() {     if (endpoint != null) {         endpoint.stop().     } }

@BeforeClass public static void startService() {     Object implementor = new GreeterImpl().     String address = "http://localhost:" + getPort1() + "/CxfGreeterCXFMessageRouterTest/SoapContext/SoapPort".     endpoint = Endpoint.publish(address, implementor). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             context.setErrorHandlerFactory(new NoErrorHandlerBuilder()).             from("cxf:bean:routerEndpoint?dataFormat=CXF_MESSAGE&publishedEndpointUrl=http://www.simple.com/services/test").to("cxf:bean:serviceEndpoint?dataFormat=CXF_MESSAGE").         }     }. }
